name: Harobots
overview: Harobots was first released on the Wonderswan in 1999 and then on the Game Boy Color (as Harobots GB) in 2000. It was developed by anime giant Sunrise's video game division, and draws on the company's vast library of robot anime series. It follows the formula of many Pokémon-like RPGs and features a young protagonist who wants to become a "Harobots Battle" Master.
